name: Rise Of The Owls
description:
This is another 48-hour contest entry. The theme this time was 'The Tower', so I made a tower defense game, which takes place inside a tower!  You'll need both strategy and luck to hire the right heroes from your Inn to stop the owls before they can make off with the king's precious treasure. 

* 15 levels until YOU=WIN!

* 15 Awe-inspiring heroes to defend the tower with

* Bloinky sounds, and the ability to disable them

* A unique scoring scheme that rewards taking risk and playing smart

* Evil owls!
